name: iPhone 12 Pro
desc: The iPhone 12 Pro is a flagship smartphone from Apple, known for its powerful performance, high-quality camera system, and sleek design.

name: Samsung Galaxy S21
desc: The Samsung Galaxy S21 is a premium Android smartphone with a stunning display, advanced camera features, and top-notch performance.

name: Sony PlayStation 5
desc: The Sony PlayStation 5 is the latest generation gaming console, offering cutting-edge graphics, immersive gameplay, and a range of exclusive titles.

name: MacBook Pro 16
desc: The MacBook Pro 16 is a powerful laptop by Apple, designed for professionals and creatives, featuring a large display and impressive performance.

name: DJI Mavic Air 2
desc: The DJI Mavic Air 2 is a compact yet advanced drone with high-quality camera capabilities, intelligent flight modes, and extended battery life.
